did.unittitle: Libro de govierno en donde se sientan las cordilleras y edictos de los illustrissimos se単ores obispos el que se hiso siendo cura y vicario y interino de este veneficio de Tusta Don Dionicio Josse Canales; y Comenso el dia 17 de Julio, del a単o de 1793
did.abstract: The volume appears to be an administrative account relating to the tracts of land controlled by the church in various areas of Mexico, including Guatemala.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Purchased from David Amram and accessioned, 01/--/1938 (1938 77911).

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Corrected title: Libro de govierno en donde se sientan las cordilleras y edictos de los illustrissimos se単ores obispos el que se hiso siendo cura y vicario interino de este veneficio de Tusta Don Dionicio Josse Canales; y Comenso el dia 17 de Julio, del a単o de 1793 [corr. from 1796].

odd.head: Early American History Note
odd.p: This manuscript collection falls outside the geographic scope of the Early American guide (British North America and the United States before 1840). It may be of interest to scholars interested in global history, international relations, imperialism, or the U.S. in the world.

controlaccess.subject: Beyond Early America
